name: Jules
description:
Jules plays many low-cost birds with [area=Fleeting][img=kw-Fleeting][/area], that fly away once played. This leaves your deck light as a feather in the late game, making it easy to consistently draw your higher cost cards round after round.

Their honest and unapologetic nature is reflected in the birds being clearly [area=Visible][img=kw-Visible][/area] to your opponent, making it difficult for you to deceive them.

name: Adonis
description:
Adonis plays fiery cards that leave behind [color=#FABD5D][area=_Ashes]Ashes[/area][/color] in your discard pile, fueling explosive plays like [color=#FABD5D][area=_Veteran]Veteran[/area][/color] in the mid-game. Once you hit 12 cards in your discard pile, you can play [color=#FABD5D][area=_Death]Death[/area][/color] for free, followed in the same round by [color=#FABD5D][area=_Cling]Cling[/area][/color] to keep the combo going for many rounds in a row.

Try to win as fast as possible, since once your deck runs out you'll be left with a discard pile full of [color=#FABD5D][area=_Ashes]Ashes[/area][/color] that will be shuffled to form a pretty bad deck.
